kes274psu.eduSalmo 150Ave MariaThe language isnt really an issue because we sing in it all the timeWere kind of the unofficial science choir since theres this huge mass of engineers in it but we love it and music is very mathematical PERIOD Our biggest problem is learning all the music in three four weeks and performing from memory.It provides an early focusIts a jumpstart into the performance season.If Music Be the Food of LoveSouth Australia.If Music Be the Food of LoveI guess you could describe it as a choral love songSouth Australiafun very rhythmically challenging has an unusual meter and then changes meter.By the end youre very energizedThere are very quick notes  eighths sixteenths even thirtysecond notes PERIOD Though mentally you may be tired it makes you want to move forward.Its perfectThe acoustics are ideal and in a place like that there will be added visual interest.The great thing from the audiences perspective is that its a fastmoving evening of varietyEveryone will like something different in it. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD
